data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Kaberamaido that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kaberamaido, Uganda

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Kaberamaido, Uganda by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Kaberamaido, Uganda that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Kaberamaido, Uganda.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Hindi people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 1,127 believers living in Kaberamaido, Uganda.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the state of Kaberamaido to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.section_summary:
the state of Kaberamaido, Uganda has a population of 3,400.

We estimate Kaberamaido has 1,127 people who might know Jesus, 1,698 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 575 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 3,400 people living in Kaberamaido.
